tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: As a regular online student, using proctorU is a normal thing in many online classes. I enjoyed taking Mr. Scanlan\'s class although the topic is not something I usually enjoy. He provided plenty of resources and his class was work at your own pace, which I really liked. I didn\'t feel like there was a lot of home work despite some other reviews.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  AMAZING LECTURES  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Breaks down material well. Welcomes questions. Homework given approx once biweekly) Tests are 33 questions (less than 10 mathematical) and a bonus question. Equation sheets provided for each exam so don\'t memorize formulas (only know what they mean: V velocity) Lectures in class but he records & uploads lectures to mycourses. Highly recommended!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: You are forced to use an online service called ProctorU to take tests. This is a service where you are forced to schedule your tests 72 hours ahead of time so that a person can watch you take the test. Also, you must buy a webcam and you must pay for each test, totaling $100 just to take the tests. Invasion of privacy and a complete rip off.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I loved this class. He does a wonderful job explaining the material very clearly and provides a ton of material to help students do well. He records every lecture and uploads it onto mycourses. He provides videos with examples which are almost exactly the same problems you encounter on the exam. Learn the concepts and you will do great.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  AMAZING LECTURES  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Do your homework !!!! I had fellow students that failed. Why you ask because they did not do their homework. The guy is hilarious , but does not take excuses. He an amazing lecturer, when he did his math videos they would just open my eyes to math equations I had been struggling with. Yes, his test are hard, so read the chapters & study.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: His test are straight forward, right from lecture. He is a smartass but is willing to help. Makes connections with real life senerios to help understand. DO NOT TRY TO CORRECT HIM. I thought he was kinda funny too. Show up to class, takes notes, do homework and you will do fine.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  RESPECTED  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: I really enjoyed his class. Yes, he\'s tough and definitely requires some studying and work. But Scanlan is very descriptive during his class and will definitely help you with any problem you have. He seems intimidating but he\'s really a good teacher.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I took him for astronomy. I did the homework, studied and came to class everyday (attendance is mandatory!) and still did not pass. I\'m not sure exactly where he gets his test questions from. The subject itself is VERY interesting but I probably will not take it again if he is the only one that will teach it.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: He is tough, but the subject is tough. I found him to be extremely fair, and yes a little smarty pants at times, but so are most of us, I thought he was funny. Go to class, show respect, show him that you care, are interested, and trying. It\'s hard but not impossible. Great teacher!!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Mr Scanlan is a very nice guy. Class attendance is not mandatory but I suggest you make it you business to attend class if you want to pass. Physics is a very hard subject.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: The test do not come from back of book it cones from text throughout chapters and homework and also lecture notes. Homework can be easy but usually difficult

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Physics is a difficult subject. Period. It requires you take your "box of tools" and apply what you\'ve learned to new situations. Scanlan tries to get his students to think for themselves, which is necessary in this subject. He is, however, willing to help those that really need it. Great guy.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I had him for Math 0002 and he is not a bad teacher at all!!! People complain about him but I don\'t understand why...I did fine in his class and his tests are EXACTLY what we would go over in class...He is a good teacher!!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: He is an arrogant person. Who doesnt need to be a teacher. Cant understand his test or the direction. Cant teach any subject. Sometimes he is smarty pants. He doesnt care about his students and doesnt want to help them which I think is selfish. Horrible.....never again.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Participation matters (2)  Respected (1)  Hilarious (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)
comments: He is a good professor. Lectures are great. Gives homework for points. Tests come straight from the multiple-choice questions at the back of the chapters. DO NOT SCREW UP ON HOMEWORK!
